name: Firefighter - Simulator 3D
description:
This fire truck simulator game has stunning physics and realistic gameplay.
Your main duty of Firefighters - Fire truck sim will be to extinguish the car fires and become the firefighter hero. So get in your big truck and hurry up. You’ve to complete your mission in the given time otherwise you will fail the level and have to try again.

Characteristics of this free game:
- Gradual difficulty.
- Realistic control.
- Realistic simulation of the vehicle.
- A race against time requiring rapidity.
- Extinguish the different fires.

So do you have what it takes to become the superhero of the city and show off your fireman skills!
